author: Ian Bennett
comment: When I set the focus to the seconds field when defining a timer it immediately moves the focus to the description field
title: Broken on Android 7

author: Dominic McKinley
comment: Great app, nice simple and customisable. Only missing part would be to have it vibrate at the end of each time segment so I dont need to keep my eyes on it while AeroPressing. Then would be an easy 5 star and recommend to mates.

author: Jimmy Merritello
comment: Well done. Simple, useful tool. Works as advertised.
title: Just what I needed
